dna.analysethis.domain

Class Codon

  • java.lang.Object
    • dna.analysethis.domain.Sequence
      • dna.analysethis.domain.Codon

  • public class Codon
extends Sequence
    Class for the representation of codons that is sequences of three bases.
    See Also:
    Sequence

      • isStartCodon

        public boolean isStartCodon()
        Checks whether the codon is a start codon that is ATG.
        Returns:
        True if the codon is the start codon.
        See Also:

        Returns:
